backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the bird atlas app, defining data types (BirdData, TeamMember, etc.) and providing CRUD operations for bird records, locations, user profiles, team members, contact data, and access control using blob storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features with their IDs, titles, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels — covering BirdDataTable column restoration, BirdGallery upload functionality, and other UI/backend features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and recent changes of each component, hook, page, and style file in the project.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point for the React app, configured for Arabic RTL layout with the app title 'مواقع انتشار البوم بمحافظة البريمي' and an owl favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router using TanStack Router and React Query, defining lazy-loaded routes for home, data, gallery, bird details, map, eagle-owl, statistics, image-view, and permissions pages within a shared root layout.
Interactive Leaflet map component that fetches all bird location coordinates from the backend and renders filterable markers by bird name, loading Leaflet dynamically from CDN with Arabic UI and error handling.
frontend/src/components/BirdDataTable.ts: A data table component for displaying, searching, editing, adding, and deleting bird records with admin-only controls, inline row editing, and CSV export functionality.
A detail page component that displays comprehensive information about a single bird (names, description, images, audio) fetched by name from the route params.
frontend/src/components/BirdGallery.tsx: A gallery component for browsing bird records with card-based display, and modals for adding new birds and uploading audio files, including image upload support.
frontend/src/components/BirdSelector.tsx: A simple dropdown selector component for choosing a bird by name from a provided list, with a loading skeleton state.
frontend/src/components/DeferredComponen: A wrapper component that delays rendering of its children by a priority-based timeout to reduce initial memory load, showing a placeholder or spinner in the meantime.
frontend/src/components/DesertOwlScene.t: A scene component that detects WebGL support and renders a static hero image of a desert owl with a gradient overlay as a fallback to avoid memory issues.
frontend/src/components/DesertOwlSceneCo: An empty file with no content.
frontend/src/components/EagleOwlPage.tsx: A page component dedicated to the Eagle Owl species, filtering bird data and locations by owl-related keywords and displaying stats, a hero section, and a list of matching birds.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: A React class component that catches rendering errors, displays an Arabic error UI with retry options, and auto-retries once after 3 seconds.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: A top-level React error boundary that catches unhandled errors app-wide and shows an Arabic fallback UI with a full-page reload button that clears storage.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: A dropdown hamburger navigation menu with seven Arabic-labeled routes, closing on outside click or Escape key, built with Lucide icons and TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/ImageViewPage.ts: A full-screen image viewer page that reads an image URL from history state and provides zoom, rotation, and reset controls.
frontend/src/components/Interactive3DMap: A React Three Fiber 3D map component for Al-Buraimi that detects WebGL support and falls back to a static 2D image on unsupported devices.
frontend/src/components/Interactive3DOwl: A React Three Fiber 3D owl sprite component using a transparent PNG texture, with a plain image fallback when WebGL is unavailable.
A paginated gallery grid component that progressively loads items in batches with infinite scroll and a manual load-more button.
frontend/src/components/LazyMapComponent: A progressive loading wrapper for map components that shows an animated Arabic placeholder while the map initializes, using DeferredComponent with a configurable delay.
frontend/src/components/MainHeader.tsx: The main sticky header component with logo, desktop navigation links, and authentication controls (login/logout via Internet Identity), including an admin-only permissions link.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: A Leaflet-based map component that dynamically loads Leaflet from CDN, renders bird location markers with image popups, and filters out invalid coordinates.
frontend/src/components/MemoryRecoveryNo: A temporary notification banner that appears after a memory-recovery page reload, reading a sessionStorage flag and auto-dismissing with a 5-second countdown.
frontend/src/components/OfficialAlBuraim: Displays the official Al Buraimi Governorate map from Oman's National Survey Authority inside a responsive, lazily-loaded iframe.
frontend/src/components/OwlGallery.tsx: An audio player component for a named bird that fetches and plays its associated audio file, showing play/pause controls or a fallback message if no audio is available.
frontend/src/components/PermissionManage: An admin-only page for assigning user roles via Internet Identity, with access guards for unauthenticated users and non-admin principals.
frontend/src/components/SafeInteractive3: A safe wrapper that dynamically imports the Interactive3DOwl component with error handling and a static image fallback, using deferred loading to reduce initial memory pressure.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Renders a full-screen Arabic/English splash screen with an owl image, project title, and an animated 'Enter' button that triggers a fade-out transition before calling the `onEnter` callback.
frontend/src/components/Static3DAlBuraim: Displays a static (non-interactive) 3D map of Al Buraimi Governorate using React Three Fiber, loading an official map texture onto a flat plane with realistic lighting and a fixed camera angle.
frontend/src/components/StaticAlBuraimiM: Shows a static map image of Al Buraimi, loading it from blob storage if an active map reference exists or falling back to a local asset; admin users can upload a new map image.
frontend/src/components/StatisticsPage.t: Displays bird observation statistics including summary cards for total bird species, locations, and audio files, plus a Recharts bar chart and data table of per-bird location counts.
frontend/src/components/TeamDataTable.ts: Renders a static team roster UI showing hardcoded lists of project followers, members, a project manager, and a designer in Arabic using card-based layouts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes due to identity updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flows, identity persistence, and exposing status flags and the current identity to consumers.
frontend/src/hooks/useMemoryOptimization: React hook that monitors JS heap memory usage at regular intervals, shows a warning notification at 50% usage, and triggers a page reload with session cache cleanup at 65% usage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for fetching and mutating bird data, locations, user profiles, and roles, with toast notifications for mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind base/component/utility layers, CSS custom properties for a desert-themed light/dark color scheme, and styles for splash screen, image view, and site manager UI elements.
frontend/src/lib/csvExport.ts: Utility module that converts an array of BirdData objects to a UTF-8 BOM CSV string with Arabic headers and triggers a browser file download with a timestamped filename.
frontend/src/lib/excelExport.ts: Utility that exports bird data to an Excel-compatible CSV file using native browser APIs, with Arabic column headers and UTF-8 BOM encoding for proper Arabic text rendering.
frontend/src/lib/memoryManager.ts: Singleton-style MemoryManager class that periodically checks JS heap usage, fires warning/critical callbacks at configurable thresholds (50%/65%), and triggers automatic recovery via registered callbacks or page reload.
frontend/src/lib/pdfExport.ts: Utility that exports an array of BirdData to a printable HTML page opened in a new browser window, triggering the native print dialog for PDF saving. Includes Arabic-language table formatting and print-specific CSS.
frontend/src/lib/requiredAssets.ts: Defines and validates required static asset paths (owl hero image and logo) at module load time, throwing errors for missing paths and logging registrations in development.
frontend/src/lib/webglDetector.ts: Provides utilities to detect WebGL 1/2 support and mobile device status, and includes helper functions for normalizing and comparing bird names by stripping whitespace, dashes, and Arabic tatweel characters.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BirdDataPage.tsx: Page component that renders the BirdDataTable with a header and navigation links back to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component featuring a splash screen, navigation cards to major app sections, an owl click sound effect, and a drag-and-drop custom map image uploader with localStorage persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, extended border radius, box shadows, accordion keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking version history, known issues (missing images, disappeared data/buttons across deployments), architectural notes, and existing feature records for the Al Buraimi owl distribution tracker app.
